events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-29, involving significant vehicle damage after a collision at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the provided details including vehicle collision and damage.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer through the claim process and gather further information about the accident.
The customer was contacted to confirm the claim receipt and assured that the case will be handled promptly and professionally.
The company requested accident reports, photos of vehicle damage, and police report documents to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all required documents including police report, vehicle photos, and witness statements to support the claim.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted files and contacted involved parties to verify details surrounding the vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded that the accident was caused by the third party who ran a red light, confirming the insured’s claim validity.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on the assessed damage and policy coverage for the car collision.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the speed of service during the claim handling process.
Management approved the claim for settlement payment, confirming that all investigation and paperwork were in order.
The settlement payment was issued to the customer promptly, covering the repair costs as agreed in the settlement proposal.
The claim was officially closed after confirming payment receipt and customer’s acknowledgment that all matters were resolved.
All claim documents and correspondence were securely archived for future reference and compliance with regulatory requirements.
